channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for SC
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for SC

item.title: Report E-2023090587
item.description:
Report E-2023090587

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-25T03:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-25
  • City: HOPKINS
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: QUALITY CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: DURING UNLOADING OPERATIONS AT CONSIGNEE LOCATION WHEN CAP WAS REMOVED FROM LOADING/UNLOADING LINE, MATERIAL IN PIPE DRAINED INTO 5-GAL RELEASE BUCKET. HOSE CONNECTED AND UNLOADING COMPLETED WITHOUT ADDITIONAL INCIDENT. INTERNAL INVESTIGATION SHOWED GASKET IN LINE WAS DAMAGED DUE TO AGE AND REPLACED.

item.title: Report X-2023081654
item.description:
Report X-2023081654

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-21T15:10:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-22
  • City: LADSON
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was being loaded onto tugger train when noticed wet, box deteriorated. Package was separated by administrative personnel for inspection. DescribePack: Recessed cap allowed liquid content to escape. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was isolated from operations and staff personnel.

item.title: Report X-2023081645
item.description:
Report X-2023081645

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-20T15:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-21
  • City: FORT MILL
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND IN THE HMPA WITH LIQUID PRESENT ON BOTH THE BOTTOM AND SIDE OF THE BOX. THIS LIQUID WAS CORRODING THE BOX AND THE INNER BOX. THE BOTTLES WERE TAKEN OUT OF THE BOX AND INSPECTED. THERE WERE TWO GALLON BOTTLES THAT HAD LOOSE LIDS AND LEAKED OUT ABOUT HALF OF THE LIQUID. DescribePack: PACKAGE FAILURE WAS IN THE LID. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE BOX AND GALLON JUGS WERE PLACED IN A LINED DRUM.

item.title: Report X-2023081614
item.description:
Report X-2023081614

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-20T15:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-21
  • City: FORT MILL
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND LEAKING IN UNLOAD. IT WAS TAKEN TO THE HAZ PROCESSING AREA AND CONTAINED. DescribePack: FAILURE WAS IN THE CAPS DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE CAP WAS TIGHTENED AND THE BOX AND INNER BOTTLES WERE PLACED IN A LINED DRUM.

item.title: Report X-2023081572
item.description:
Report X-2023081572

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-20T15:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-17
  • City: SPARTANBURG
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE UNLOADED FROM CUSTOMER TRAILER. HAZMAT-CERTIFIED ADMIN NOTIFIED OF DAMAGED HAZMAT PACKAGE. DescribePack: BOTTLE LEAKED FROM UNDER LOOSE CAP WITH BROKEN SEAL. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: HAZMAT-CERTIFIED ADMIN USING PROPER PPE PLACED THE PACKAGE INSIDE A LINED HAZMAT TOTE AND SECURED THE TOTE INSIDE THE HAZMAT CAGE.

item.title: Report X-2023081563
item.description:
Report X-2023081563

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-20T15:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-18
  • City: FORT MILL
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND IN UNLOAD WITH A STRONG SMELLING LIQUID ON TOP. THE LIQUID BEGAN EATING THE LABEL AND OP-900. IT WAS IMMEDIATELY PLACED IN A LINED DRUM AND CLOSED TO ELIMINATE THE EMISSION OF FUMES DescribePack: FAILURE WAS IN THE O-RING SEAL ON TOP OF THE PLASTIC DRUM. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: DRUM WAS PLACES IN A LINED DRUM SINCE THERE WAS NO WAY TO TIGHTEN THE O-RING SEAL/CLOSURE.

item.title: Report X-2023081209
item.description:
Report X-2023081209

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-18T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-15
  • City: LADSON
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package located completely wet/destroyed, liquid contents having escaped. Package was isolated from sortation to ensure safety. DescribePack: Loose cap on 1 jug allowed liquid contents to escape container. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: Package was separated from sortation and placed in hazardous materials tub to prevent further spillage.

item.title: Report X-2023081184
item.description:
Report X-2023081184

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-18T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-10
  • City: MYRTLE BEACH
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: We noticed dripping coming from the package and the action taken once discovered was to take the package and set it aside to be inspected for the cause & resolution. DescribePack: On the bottom neck of the package, we noticed a pin hole leak. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Remove the leaking item and placing it into a black tote.
